title: Alleged robber shot by victim outside N. Harris County apartment
content:
HARRIS COUNTY, Texas – Deputy constables are investigating a shooting that happened outside a north Harris County apartment complex early Thursday. 

The shooting was reported around 1:10 a.m. at the Augusta apartments on Kuykendahl at Demontrond. 

The robbery victim told Pct. 4 Deputy Constables that he was approached by a man with a gun. The victim pulled out a weapon of his own and shot the would-be robber. 

The suspect was taken to the hospital in stable condition and is expected to survive. 

The robbery victim was not hurt. 

The shooting was reported around 1:10 a.m. at the Augusta apartments on Kuykendahl at Demontrond.
